original_text: And I will spread my net upon him, and he shall be taken in my snare, and I will bring him to Babylon, and will plead with him there for his trespass that he hath trespassed against me.
korean_text: 그 위에 내 그물을 치며 내 올무에 걸리게 하여 끌고 바벨론으로 가서 나를 반역한 그 반역을 거기에서 심판할지며

sentences.original_text: And I will spread my net upon him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 그 위에 그물을 펼치겠다

sentences.original_text: and he shall be taken in my snare
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 내 덫에 걸릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: and I will bring him to Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 그를 바벨론으로 데려갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: and will plead with him there
for his trespass that he hath trespassed against me
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나를 거스른 그의 허물 때문에
